**38. Our financial information as at March 31, 2023 is not comparable with our financial information as at March 31, 2024 and March 31, 2025.**

Our Board of Directors approved a scheme of arrangement dated September 28, 2023 (the “Scheme”) between our Company, Sterlite Grid 5 Limited (“SGL5”) and their respective shareholders and creditors for the demerger of our infrastructure business into SGL5. The National Company Law Tribunal sanctioned the Scheme by its order dated September 5, 2024. The Scheme meets the requirements of Ind AS 105 “Non-current Assets Held for Sale and Discontinued Operations” and therefore the financial information with respect to the Infrastructure Business has been reported as a discontinued operation in the Restated Consolidated Financial Information until the effective date of September 26, 2024.

Our restated consolidated summary statements of profit and loss (including other comprehensive income) and restated consolidated summary cash flow statements for the years ended March 31, 2023, March 31, 2024 and March 31, 2025 included in our Restated Consolidated Financial Information, reflect the split between our continuing and discontinued operations. Our restated consolidated summary statements of assets and liabilities as at March 31, 2023 does not include any split between continuing and discontinued operations and our restated consolidated summary statement of assets and liabilities as at March 31, 2024 and March 31, 2025 reflect only our continuing operations. Accordingly, our restated consolidated summary statements of assets and liabilities as at March 31, 2023 is not comparable with our restated consolidated summary statements of assets and liabilities as at March 31, 2024 and March 31, 2025. Consequently, any financial information as at March 31, 2023 is not comparable with the corresponding information as at March 31, 2024 and March 31, 2025. Prospective investors are cautioned not to place undue reliance on any financial information that is based on the assets and liabilities as at March 31, 2023.
